explains: adj. 应斥责的；应该谴责的

sentences.en: Mr. Cramer said the violence by anti-government protestors was reprehensible.
sentences.cn: 克拉默先生说反政府示威者们的暴力行为应受到谴责。

sentences.en: I thought that is really reprehensible.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这是应该谴责的。

sentences.en: Poor judgment is reprehensible, but not illegal.
sentences.cn: 判断力低下是要受到谴责，不过构不成违法。
